title: Im pretty sure League crashed my laptop... yes, my laptop.
body: I was in-game playing with a couple friends in Summoner’s Rift, and I recall to get items. I went to go ping(alt) to show how much more gold I need, to get a certain item, and League freezes. I’m like “Okay.. it must just be League since I can still hear my friends in discord, so ill just wait it out.” I couldn’t alt+f4 nor could I ctrl+alt+del, and nor could I alt+tab or windows. A couple of minutes later my laptop’s sceen goes black and I can no longer hear my friends. Not knowing what do, I decide to turn off my laptop and turn it back on (which was probably a bad idea). What I was left with was another black screen. My laptop refuses to start up and I can’t even reach the log in screen to sign into my personal account. The screen is just black and nothing is popping up, for the past 10 minutes now.

replies.body:
O_O that sounds rather worrisome....

First off, and I know this sounds silly and I'm sure you've already checked, but let's check one last time that it's connected to a power source and that the laptop battery is fully connected by taking it out and back in. After that, if you're still not getting any type of response from it I'd suggest taking it to someone local who knows laptops that you trust to work on it.
So after a series of tests, its concluded that the hard drave had failed. :/
Alrighty, thanks for taking your time into reading this!!
